price: Hakika yeye hana madaraka juu ya walio amini na wakamtegemea Mola wao Mlezi.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ سُلۡطَٰنٌ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
footnotes: Ukifanya haya kwa kumsafia niya Mwenyezi Mungu, basi atakulinda na Shetani, na atakuondolea wasiwasi. Kwani Shetani hana athari kwa walio jaa Imani ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na wakamtaka msaada na kumtegemea Yeye peke yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innahu laysa lahu sul'ṭānun ʿalā alladhīna āmanū waʿalā rabbihim yatawakkalūna
